pageContext.collection_title: Commercial Advertising Radio Disc Collection, 1950-1978, bulk 1950-1960
pageContext.collection_description: Compilation of 31 cassettes of numerous short advertisements for local, regional and national companies which aired on Portland area stations. Includes spots for the Oregon Shakespearean Festival, 1959, Blitz-Weinhard Brewing Co. and the U.S. National Bank.
